name: agent-code-tools
description: A collection of MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that provide various code-related functionalities to AI agents.

scripts.build: npm run build:regex-tools && npm run build:math-tools && npm run build:string-tools && npm run build:date-tools
scripts.http:regex-tools: cd servers/regex-tools && TRANSPORT=http PORT=3001 npm run start
scripts.http:math-tools: cd servers/math-tools && TRANSPORT=http PORT=3002 npm run start
scripts.http:string-tools: cd servers/string-tools && TRANSPORT=http PORT=3003 npm run start
scripts.http:date-tools: cd servers/date-tools && TRANSPORT=http PORT=3004 npm run start
scripts.both:regex-tools: cd servers/regex-tools && TRANSPORT=both PORT=3001 npm run start
scripts.both:math-tools: cd servers/math-tools && TRANSPORT=both PORT=3002 npm run start
scripts.both:string-tools: cd servers/string-tools && TRANSPORT=both PORT=3003 npm run start
scripts.both:date-tools: cd servers/date-tools && TRANSPORT=both PORT=3004 npm run start
scripts.clean: npm run clean:regex-tools && npm run clean:math-tools && npm run clean:string-tools && npm run clean:date-tools

author: Aidan Paetsch
